front.title: RSVP Extensions For Re-optimization of Loosely Routed Point-to-Multipoint Traffic Engineering Label Switched Paths (LSPs)

abstract.t: Re-optimization of a Point-to-Multipoint (P2MP) Traffic Engineered (TE) Label Switched Path (LSP) may be triggered based on the need to re-optimize an individual source-to-leaf (S2L) sub-LSP or a set of S2L sub-LSPs, both using Sub-Group-Based Re-optimization method, or the entire P2MP-TE LSP tree using the Make-Before-Break (MBB) method.
